thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 16 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Societe Generale Launches Placement Of 2.9 Million Fnac Darty Shares

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Societe Generale Launches Placement Of 2.9 Million Fnac Darty Shares
text:
Jan 16 (Reuters) - SOCIETE GENERALE:
* LAUNCHES A PLACEMENT OF FNAC DARTY SHARES * PLACEMENT OF 2,944,651 FNAC DARTY SHARES BY WAY OF AN ACCELERATED BOOKBUILT PRIVATE PLACEMENT TO INSTITUTIONAL INVESTORS
* IS CONDUCTED BY SOCIÉTÉ GÉNÉRALE CORPORATE & INVESTMENT BANKING ACTING AS SOLE BOOKRUNNER.
* IN CONNECTION WITH THE ENTRY INTO A DERIVATIVE TRANSACTION WITH VIVENDI IN ORDER TO PROTECT THE VALUE OF VIVENDI’S C. 11.1% STAKE IN FNAC DARTY.‍​ Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom:)
